Description:
Graphic Designer- KuwaitA. Accountabilities:Responsible for designing creative landing pages, websites, banners, and brochures.
Design and deliver wireframes, user stories, user journeys, and mock-ups optimized for a wide range of devices and interfaces.
Candidate should be able to Draw icons, clipart, and an illustrator in Adobe Illustrator.
Ability to research, prototype, and create wireframes.Skills
Skills:
Experience in UX/UI Design.
Experience in HTML5.
Experience in designing IOS apps.
Experience in Photoshop, Illustrator, Lightroom, XD.
Detail-oriented, organized, and hard-working.
Strong knowledge of responsive layouts, grids, interaction, and UI patterns.
Good understanding of the web and mobile design ecosystem.
5-7/- years experience in Graphic design role .
Bachelor in Fine Art or equivalent.

Kuwait-based/ Transferable residency.
Only Arab nationals will be contacted.
The budget for this role is KWD 600- KWD 750/- (unnegotiable).
Driving license is a plus.
